excel.name: Sign Excel programmatically
excel.description: MS Excel and Open Office spreadsheets

word.name: Watermark Word
word.description: MS Word and Open Office documents

powerpoint.name: Watermark PowerPoint
powerpoint.description: MS PowerPoint and Open Office presentations

format-actions.title: Ready to get started?
format-actions.description: Try {{ProdShortName}} features for free or request a license

esign.name: Electronic Signatures
esign.description: Add various types of signatures to supported file formats.

text.name: Add Text to Documents
text.description: Enhance document content with customizable text signatures.

image.name: Image Signatures
image.description: Place any image at any position within a document.

barcode.name: Generate Barcodes
barcode.description: Create and insert various barcodes into supported documents.

qrcode.name: Generate QR Codes
qrcode.description: Generate and apply two-dimensional barcodes, including QR codes, for document signing.

digital.name: Digital Certificates
digital.description: Secure business documents using digital certificates.

stamp.name: Stamp Signatures
stamp.description: Use the Stamp Constructor to create custom round or square stamps.

search.name: Search Signatures
search.description: Locate any previously added signatures within a document.

verify.name: Signature Verification
verify.description: Verify the authenticity of signatures after they have been applied.

modify.name: Modify Signatures
modify.description: Easily edit a variety of signatures within a document.

delete.name: Delete Signatures
delete.description: Remove a wide range of previously applied signatures.
